system.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have their Starting Ability @Affliction[nullified] until the end of battle, they are switched out, or are Fainted. If a target has more than 1 Starting Ability, they choose which of their abilities are @Affliction[nullified]. A creature can only be affected by 1 instance of Gastro Acid at a time.

actions.name: Gastro Acid
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have their Starting Ability @Affliction[nullified] until the end of battle, they are switched out, or are Fainted. If a target has more than 1 Starting Ability, they choose which of their abilities are @Affliction[nullified]. A creature can only be affected by 1 instance of Gastro Acid at a time.
